ED_Title: Election of the Executive Director of the United Nations Environment Programme
ED_DecisionText: At its 57th plenary meeting, on 18 January 2023, the General Assembly, on the nomination by the Secretary-General, (footnote: See A/77/689.) re-elected Inger ANDERSEN (Denmark) as Executive Director of the United Nations Environment Programme for a four-year term of office beginning on 15 June 2023 and ending on 14 June 2027.
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/77/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
